11. March 2023 22 Comments on
Looks like my favourite #WordPress plugin for #ActivityPub just went supersonic. It‚Äôs now officially by Pfefferle AND Automattic ü§òü•≥ https://wordpress.org/plugins/activitypub/ Hat tip to Chris Trottier (@atomicpoet)

11. March 2023 17 Comments on
No idea why but I had the sudden urge to cook something today. This is just spelt flour, milk and apple cooked with butter and salt (like noodles) served with sugar and cinnamon. And it‚Äôs delicious üòç

11. March 2023 13 Comments on
Caturday and totally relaxed despite freshly done nails üíÖ Life is good. #cats

8. March 2023 4 Comments on
Finally gave in after my usual usb recording stick choked itself hard (20 bucks variant and usually just used to debug failing system boots where the error message would only flash for a second) and ordered an EVGA XR1 Lite: https://youtu.be/VU1pbyIlPmQ It comes with a ‚Äúfree‚Äù perceived value weight üòÅ Updated: So.. the XR1 works quite decent. The most trouble I had was on the HDMI side until I found the proper output to send application sound _also_ to the device (I‚Äôm using headphones usually). Apparently there is a bug with the audio sync though, because the audio driver of‚Ä¶

6. March 2023 7 Comments on
FIY Should update within 24h https://youtu.be/RIGkmqzJdfQ It‚Äôs a #foss 6dof racing game with a #Newtonian flight model similar to #EliteDangerous. It does have a #Linux version but the world gen lib is single threaded on Linux so Proton may be a better choice for now. It also features access to full ship telemetry and head tracking including OpenTrack via UDP thanks to my nagging ü§™ No idea about VR. Apparently it works but I can‚Äôt test that. #FlyDangerous #GamingOnLinux #LinuxGaming

2. March 2023 21 Comments on
On Monday I played some #RebelGalaxyOutlaw with the little one. She‚Äôs doing alright with the delivery missions already. Only helping some with the pew pew, like shacking off rockets.

2. March 2023 11 Comments on
Playing some more with #augmentedUI (https://augmented-ui.com/) That‚Äôs all CSS o0

Hidden Chubie in AugmentedUI

27. February 2023 2 Comments on Hidden Chubie in AugmentedUI
I‚Äôm not saying that #augmentedUi has some easter eggs in it‚Äôs documentation but there is at least one Chubie (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AhXoYgB7rPU&t=13693s) and a mysterious secret hidden in one of it‚Äôs demo elements ü§ì Had a good chuckle and now I wonder what the secret is. It wasn‚Äôt just base64 or rot13 tho ü§î Is this a paper chase? http://augmented-ui.com/

Dipping into SpaceBourne 2 ‚Äì Rebuilding A Friend

24. February 2023 8 Comments on Dipping into SpaceBourne 2 ‚Äì Rebuilding A Friend
Okay, I did some recording of SpaceBourne 2 and added a voice over and even subtitles‚Ä¶ and I conclude that is way too much work but in case you‚Äôre interested into a sneak peak of this early access go ahead: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Vz4uK2Irofo / https://tube.tchncs.de/w/5h9VoeHs5vTAu3bgptc7bN

23. February 2023 5 Comments on
Looks like children can fritter a ton of sand from a single sandbox within 5 years. Possible that the cats help. The jury is still out on that. Nobody wants to touch the evidence ü§°
